CutSceneText.Text: Gaphryk has waited so long to see you, Mimiti!
No, please! You mustn't speak to me!
But Gaphryk can't just forget about Beautiful Mimiti, no!
You are the only one I have ever loved!
I love you too...but you know as well as I that a Shugo and a Kobold...can never be together! It's just not possible!
